description:
Many students asked me "How to pass CCNA exam easily and that too without much Trouble". There is very important criteria in every exam or certification. It is known as Planning and Strategy.

We all know that we can learn any technology in the world and can implement but we need to know the Basic Rules. In this case Rule is very Simple i.e. Make the effective Strategy and apply it.

I saw many students failed in CCNA- not because they were technically weak, But, were unaware of the Format ,Management Planning and Strategy which is required.

So, In this short course of 1 Hour, I have listed some of the most effective points which will help you passing this exam with flying colors.

Best wishes to all of you.
title: Learn to Pass CCNA in first Attempt
